certificate.description: Certificate settings for Gateway TLS interception. If not specified, the Cloudflare Root CA will be used.

id.description: UUID of certificate to be used for interception. Certificate must be available (previously called 'active') on the edge. A nil UUID will indicate the Cloudflare Root CA should be used.

tls.description: Enable only cipher suites and TLS versions compliant with FIPS 140-2.

host_selector.description: Setting to enable host selector in egress policies.

enabled.description: Enable filtering via hosts for egress policies.

mode.description:
Defines the mode of inspection the proxy will use.
- static: Gateway will use static inspection to inspect HTTP on TCP(80). If TLS decryption is on, Gateway will inspect HTTPS traffic on TCP(443) & UDP(443).
- dynamic: Gateway will use protocol detection to dynamically inspect HTTP and HTTPS traffic on any port. TLS decryption must be on to inspect HTTPS traffic.

enabled.description: Enable detecting protocol on initial bytes of client traffic.
Enable sandbox.

fallback_action.description: Action to take when the file cannot be scanned.

enabled.description: Enable inspecting encrypted HTTP traffic.

PATCH /accounts/{account_id}/devices/set.summary: Patch device settings for a Zero Trust account

PATCH /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/con.description: Patches the current Zero Trust account configuration. This endpoint can update a single subcollection of settings such as `antivirus`, `tls_decrypt`, `activity_log`, `block_page`, `browser_isolation`, `fips`, `body_scanning`, or `certificate`, without updating the entire configuration object. Returns an error if any collection of settings is not properly configured.

fail_closed.description: Block requests for files that cannot be scanned.

notification_settings.description: Configure a message to display on the user's device when an antivirus search is performed.

enabled.description: Set notification on

include_context.description: If true, context information will be passed as query parameters

msg.description: Customize the message shown in the notification.

support_url.description: Optional URL to direct users to additional information. If not set, the notification will open a block page.

background_color.description: If mode is customized_block_page: block page background color in #rrggbb format.

enabled.description: Enable only cipher suites and TLS versions compliant with FIPS 140-2.

footer_text.description: If mode is customized_block_page: block page footer text.

header_text.description: If mode is customized_block_page: block page header text.

include_context.description: If mode is redirect_uri: when enabled, context will be appended to target_uri as query parameters.

logo_path.description: If mode is customized_block_page: full URL to the logo file.

mailto_address.description: If mode is customized_block_page: admin email for users to contact.

mailto_subject.description: If mode is customized_block_page: subject line for emails created from block page.

mode.description: Controls whether the user is redirected to a Cloudflare-hosted block page or to a customer-provided URI.

name.description: If mode is customized_block_page: block page title.

read_only.description: This setting was shared via the Orgs API and cannot be edited by the current account

source_account.description: Account tag of account that shared this setting

suppress_footer.description: If mode is customized_block_page: suppress detailed info at the bottom of the block page.

target_uri.description: If mode is redirect_uri: URI to which the user should be redirected.

inspection_mode.description: Set the inspection mode to either `deep` or `shallow`.

non_identity_enabled.description: Enable non-identity onramp support for Browser Isolation.

certificate.description: Certificate settings for Gateway TLS interception. If not specified, the Cloudflare Root CA will be used.

id.description: UUID of certificate to be used for interception. Certificate must be available (previously called 'active') on the edge. A nil UUID will indicate the Cloudflare Root CA should be used.

custom_certificate.description: Custom certificate settings for BYO-PKI. (deprecated and replaced by `certificate`)

enabled.description: Enable use of custom certificate authority for signing Gateway traffic.

id.description: UUID of certificate (ID from MTLS certificate store).

enabled.description: Enable matching all variants of user emails (with + or . modifiers) used as criteria in Firewall policies.

read_only.description: This setting was shared via the Orgs API and cannot be edited by the current account

source_account.description: Account tag of account that shared this setting

tls.description: Enable only cipher suites and TLS versions compliant with FIPS 140-2.

host_selector.description: Setting to enable host selector in egress policies.

enabled.description: Enable filtering via hosts for egress policies.

mode.description:
Defines the mode of inspection the proxy will use.
- static: Gateway will use static inspection to inspect HTTP on TCP(80). If TLS decryption is on, Gateway will inspect HTTPS traffic on TCP(443) & UDP(443).
- dynamic: Gateway will use protocol detection to dynamically inspect HTTP and HTTPS traffic on any port. TLS decryption must be on to inspect HTTPS traffic.

enabled.description: Enable detecting protocol on initial bytes of client traffic.
Enable sandbox.

fallback_action.description: Action to take when the file cannot be scanned.

enabled.description: Enable inspecting encrypted HTTP traffic.

PUT /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/loggi.description: Updates logging settings for the current Zero Trust account.

redact_pii.description: Redact personally identifiable information from activity logging (PII fields are: source IP, user email, user ID, device ID, URL, referrer, user agent).

log_all.description: Log all requests to this service.

log_blocks.description: Log only blocking requests to this service.
